title: Squat
benefits: Fundamental exercise for lower body strength and muscle mass.
High carryover to both sports and daily movements.
setup: Place the bar on your upper back (high-bar or low-bar).
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, toes pointing slightly out.
Push your chest forward and take a deep breath to create tension.
execution: Bend at the hips and knees simultaneously to lower yourself.
Ensure your knees track in the direction of your toes.
Go as deep as your mobility allows (preferably below parallel).
Push explosively up through the entire foot.
tempoNote: Focus on a controlled eccentric phase (the way down) for maximum muscle activation.
